document_data.name: ''Winter Wolf Hat''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Winter wolf hats''''' were warm [[enchanted]] hats that carried magical properties of [[winter wolves]]' pelt they were made of.
document_data.Powers: These hats of soft white fur granted the wearers resistance to mundane and magical cold. Additionally, the hats slightly improved the wearers' charisma.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' {{YearlinkName|1281}}, [[Oswald Fiddlebender]] crafted various magic items of clothing using pelts of winter wolves that followed the [[Cultists of Auril]] plaguing [[Icewind Dale]]. Some of other items included ''[[winter wolf cloak]]s'', ''[[winter wolf gloves]]'', ''[[winter wolf scarves]]'', and ''[[winter wolf boots]]''.
